upgrade.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make a computer, machine, or piece of software better and able to do more things
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: You’ll need to upgrade your hard drive to 120Mb before running this software.
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to improve something and make it more modern, especially in order to provide a better service
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The hotel has recently been refurbished and upgraded.
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to give someone a better seat on a plane or a better room in a hotel than the one they paid for
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: We can upgrade you to business class.
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to give someone a more important job
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[4].de: to change the official description of something to make it seem better or more important
upgrade.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: Four of the regions were upgraded to the status of republic.
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to make a computer, machine, program etc better and able to do more things
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: There are several things to consider when it comes to upgrading computer memory.
You can upgrade to the latest version of the software by following these steps.
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to buy a new computer, machine etc that is better and able to do more things than your old one
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The money will be used to upgrade machinery and trucks.
In order to grow your business, you may need to upgrade to a more powerful system.
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[2].de: to get a better seat on a plane, a better rented car etc than the one you paid for
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: You can use your frequent flier mileage to upgrade to business class.
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[3].de: to put something in a better class or at a higher level on a scale than before
upgrade.translation[1].definitions[3].ex: They have upgraded their profit forecast from £1.49 billion to £1.56 billion.
upgrade.translation[2].definitions[0].de: the act of improving a product or service, or one that has been improved
upgrade.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Within two years, the company expects to complete a $110 million upgrade of its cable system.
upgrade.translation[2].definitions[1].de: new computer software that replaces previous software of the same type
upgrade.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: Three-quarters of the firm’s overall software revenues will eventually be generated by selling upgrades to existing customers.
upgrade.translation[2].definitions[2].de: an occasion when someone is given a better seat on a plane, or a better rented car, than the one they paid for
upgrade.translation[2].definitions[2].ex: If you’re lucky you might get an upgrade.
